languages.text: "Вынуждена согласиться, Лорд-капитан, история подождет. Нам нужно выяснить, зачем Кровавая паутина решила вас омыть дрянной кровью".
"I must concede as much, Lord Captain. The story can wait. We should first find out why the Bloodspun Web thought to bathe you in repugnant blood."
languages.original_text: "Вынуждена согласиться, Лорд-капитан, история подождет. Нам нужно выяснить, зачем Кровавая паутина решила вас омыть дрянной кровью".

traits.locale_text: "I must concede as much, Lord Captain. The story can wait. We should first find out why the Bloodspun Web decided to bathe you in repugnant blood."

"I must concede as much, Lord Captain. The story can wait. We should first find out why the Bloodspun Web thought to bathe you in repugnant blood."

languages.text: «Eso lo admito, Lord Capitán. La historia puede esperar, primero deberíamos averiguar por qué ha querido bañarle en esa asquerosa sangre la Red Sanguinolenta».
languages.original_text: "I must concede as much, Lord Captain. The story can wait. We should first find out why the Bloodspun Web thought to bathe you in repugnant blood."

traits.locale_text: «Eso lo admito, Lord Capitán. La historia puede esperar, primero deberíamos averiguar por qué ha querido bañarle en esa asquerosa sangre la Red Sanguinolenta».

languages.text: 「そこには同意せざるを得ません、ロード・キャプテン。話は後回しです。まずは、ブラッドスパン・ウェブがあなた様におぞましい血を浴びせようと考えた理由を突き止めるべきです」
languages.original_text: "I must concede as much, Lord Captain. The story can wait. We should first find out why the Bloodspun Web thought to bathe you in repugnant blood."

traits.locale_text: 「そこには同意せざるを得ません、ロード・キャプテン。話は後回しです。まずは、ブラッドスパン・ウェブがあなた様におぞましい血を浴びせようと考えた理由を突き止めるべきです」

languages.text: “我也完全赞同，舰长大人。故事可以先放一放，我们得先搞清楚，织血罗网的人为什么打算让您淹没在这令人作呕的血泊里。”
languages.original_text: "I must concede as much, Lord Captain. The story can wait. We should first find out why the Bloodspun Web thought to bathe you in repugnant blood."

traits.locale_text: “我也完全赞同，舰长大人。故事可以先放一放，我们得先搞清楚，织血罗网的人为什么打算让您淹没在这令人作呕的血泊里。”

languages.text: "Ich gebe allerdings zu, Lord Captain. Die Geschichte kann warten. Zuerst sollten wir herausfinden, warum Euch das Blutgesponnene Netz in abscheulichem Blut baden wollte."
languages.original_text: "I must concede as much, Lord Captain. The story can wait. We should first find out why the Bloodspun Web thought to bathe you in repugnant blood."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe allerdings zu, Lord Captain. Die Geschichte kann warten. Zuerst sollten wir herausfinden, warum Euch das Blutgesponnene Netz in abscheulichem Blut baden wollte."

languages.text: « Je dois admettre que le moment est mal choisi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Pour l'heure, nous devons avant tout découvrir pourquoi la Toile de Sang a déversé ce sang impur dans l'eau de votre bain. »
languages.original_text: "I must concede as much, Lord Captain. The story can wait. We should first find out why the Bloodspun Web thought to bathe you in repugnant blood."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois admettre que le moment est mal choisi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Pour l'heure, nous devons avant tout découvrir pourquoi la Toile de Sang a déversé ce sang impur dans l'eau de votre bain. »

languages.text: "O kadarını ben de kabul ediyorum. Hikâye bekleyebilir. Önce Kanipi Ağı'nın sizi neden böylesine iğrenç bir kanda yıkamak istediğini öğrenmemiz gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "I must concede as much, Lord Captain. The story can wait. We should first find out why the Bloodspun Web thought to bathe you in repugnant blood."
